Articles.Content:
i have heard that to update ksp you need to redownload the game.

how would i be able to save my ships and builds?

i don't have the steam edition that has the auto-updater

Just make a backup of your whole KSP folder and put it aside. After upgrading or making a new, pristine install, you can just copy the your craft files to the new installation and see if they work.

Regarding Steam and auto-updates, what I do:

Download KSP as fresh, pristine installation. Copy (or move) the KSP folder to a different location (e.g. C:\KSP 1.8) and use only that folder from that on. No more surprise (and potentially disruptive) auto updates  

I also recommend to regularly make backups of your KSP folder, did save me more than one from a broken game due to broken/incompatible mods.

Edited February 15, 2020 by VoidSquid
